content: It almost slipped my mind — today marks the first day of our new life! Looks like everyone is having such a wonderful day.
info: 制作美食-格连闲聊_主流程文本II

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, we've all had a long day. It's time to kick back together! {A得意}Just wait for the tasty dishes at our very first gathering!
info: 制作美食-格连闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A歪头}Mobai said the beginning is always the hardest. But now that we're working together, it doesn't seem all that difficult, does it? <style=SizeSmall>I'm going to put all my effort into this!</style>
info: 制作美食-格连闲聊_主流程文本II

content: I'm helping Captain Mo get the ingredients ready for dinner. {A灵光一现}These plain mushrooms might actually be perfect for cooking. Well, if Captain Mo says so, then it's gotta be true.
info: 制作美食-格连闲聊_主流程文本II
